TaxonIdentification.variety_authority: Tang & F. T. Wang ex S. Yun Lian g

TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 少花藏薹草 shao hua zang tai cao

treatment.description: Leaf blades 6–12 mm wide. Lateral spikes 6- or 7-flowered.
treatment.distribution: ● Cliffs along streamsides; ca. 2200 m. Yunnan (Yongshan).
